lines:
You can't go further than that,
      this place doesn't exist yet
ok... but what are we doing then?!

Perhaps it is a sign,
        an opportunity to reflect on our lives...
Are we not all an unfinished piece of work?
That's really profound and all but...

Do you know when this place will exist?
        I have to find socks for an annoying goblin...
What I do know is that the game will restart...
